summary: A legendary sword that is made from the teeth of a dragon. This sword will light your enemies ablaze with dragon fire.
descriptionHtml:
This sword is currently a WIP. I am working on textures and fire effects right now. After getting it through, I will open this to the public.

A legendary sword that is made from the teeth of a dragon. This sword will light your enemies ablaze with dragon fire.

I hope to add a quest mod that you have to go along a journey to acquire the pieces to craft the sword, but I may have to wait on that as school has picked back up.

Drakoia - dra-koy-ya

No, it isn\'t part of the dragon language, but should be.

This sword won\'t be overpowerful, but it will be strong as it will take a lot of time and energy to receive if I find out how I want to build the quest for it.

Currently no textures.
author: Litanys
